What does the attention mechanism in the model focus on when generating captions for an image?

The model uses a two-dimensional attention mechanism to focus on specific parts of the image while generating captions, allowing it to concentrate on relevant areas for each word and ignore less pertinent details, such as the giraffe when discussing trees.
